group_1.textRight: W-who's there?!

group_1.textLeft: More Familiars?!@[chara:300500:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300500:cheek_-1][chara:300500:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_0][chara:300500:lipSynch_1]...No, they don't seem like it.

group_1.textRight: Tokiwa-san...!@How did all of you get into this Labyrinth?
W-wait!
This is weird!
Y'see, the three of us...

group_1.narration: "These are the two locations where I sensed the Witch."
"The first was here: the Mirror Mansion."
"The second was the so-called Swindlers' Town in Daito."
"Unfortunately, I'm not familiar@with the geography of Daito.@But I'm sure the three of you@are familiar with that location, no?"
"So I'd like to pass the torch to you, now. @Please leave Endless Mirrors to us, and do@whatever you can to investigate Swindlers' Town..."

group_1.textRight: So you all came to this Labyrinth from the Mirror Mansion?

group_1.textLeft: Something was showin' us these awful dreams...
Hazuki and I were also involved.
Honestly, if we hadn't heard Nanaka-san's voice, @we would've been in deep trouble...

group_1.textRight: Her voice...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. The two of us were also being shown a similar@illusion.

group_1.textRight: But when we reached out to the voice we heard,@it vanished.
After that, nothing's made much sense.
The door we found within the Labyrinth turned out@to be a dead end...
And as we were all searching for another route...
The path suddenly opened up, and we met all of you.

group_1.textLeft: Right around when my barricade of Mirrors coins @broke down...
The original Witch most likely noticed, and began@moving again.

group_1.textRight: So the Labyrinths suddenly connected, and you @popped out here in Daito...
Does that mean you basically teleported?!

group_1.textLeft: I-is something like that even possible...?

group_1.textRight: Well, they did arrive here from Endless Mirrors.
It may have just been an illusion, but we saw outside@scenery inside of Mirrors for the first time...
If the Mirrors familiars aren't just copying our@appearances and abilities...
But even our memories as well...
Then they could obtain just about any information@there is.
It's just a theory.
But if they linked two real-world regions together, @using that power to show us lies in the form of @illusions...
And that was reflected back on reality...?

group_1.textLeft: Do you mean to say that the two regions would@*actually* become linked?!

group_1.textRight: That's ridiculous...!

group_1.textLeft: Tell a lie enough times, and it can become true.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?
D'you mean you can even make lies into reality...?
It's too much of a leap. We have no evidence with @which to solidify that theory.

group_1.textCenter: All we can be sure of right now is the fact that @Mirrors can show us illusions...
...And the possibility that our memories are being@copied as well.
And how right now, in reality, the Labyrinths have @been connected regardless of physical distance.
Labyrinths are already separate spaces that exist parallel to our world.
It's not particularly surprising that two of them @became connected to each other.
Really, what's frightening right now is their ability@to interfere with other spaces.
The Mirror Witch could just keep running and @running, without us ever catching it...

group_1.textLeft: Even if it doesn't attack people, we certainly can't @leave things in this state.

group_1.textRight: Right...
If it keeps on maturing, it'll eventually be too late...!
We've gotta take it down together!

group_1.textLeft: Yeahâ€” at least this ex-familiar Mirror Witch, if @nothing else.

group_1.textRight: Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: If the Mirror Witch is headed for Swindlers' Town...
Then I think there's at least one civilian who'll die as @a result.
